DOC.brief_summary: This study ass whether post-resection adjuvant therapy pembrolizumab improve recurrence-free survival ( RFS ) compare placebo high-risk participant melanoma ( Stage IIIA [ > 1 mm metastasis ] , IIIB IIIC ) . Participants stratify stage disease region randomly assign receive either pembrolizumab placebo .
